success.body:
We have good news for you.

Your KYC at LOCK is completed and the review has been successful!

You can start using LOCK anytime now and enjoy rewards on your Cryptos with a maximum of flexibility, security and transparency.
success.title: LOCK KYC successful

failed.body:
Unfortunately, Your KYC at LOCK failed!

However, You can proceed with the Video-Identification to finalize your KYC at LOCK here

In any case of questions, please reach out to: support@lock.space
failed.title: LOCK KYC failed
